actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to liberalize the conditions governing eligibility of blind persons to receive disability insurance benefits thereunder.

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to revise the conditions governing eligibility of blind persons to receive disability insurance benefits.

titles.title: A bill amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to liberalize the conditions governing eligibility of blind persons to receive disability insurance benefits thereunder.
